column4: and totem came up, it searched for codecs, and I verified to install the restricted gstreamer codecs
however, when the dvd menu came up
I could not click on any of the buttons
I'm installing this for my dad, who is a total technoloy newb
play this dvd pops up and offers to start totem when he clicks on it
thats the user experience I want
bzhang, yeah, I've read of all of that
and you installed the necessary packages?
w32codecs, libdvdcss2, and, uh, what else,I snagged the dvd navigation ones as well
and what other apps have you tried to play it
its not a problem with dvd playback
I know that totemgstreamer, in the past, did not HAVE dvd support
